Dec 2 W13D3 Problem Solving 8: Simple Harmonic Oscillator

problem.p: Reading Assignment: Young and Freedman: Chapter 14.1-14.6 and Class Slides W13D1 and W13D2

(1) Explain how you would calculate the angular frequency of small oscillations of a system given the potential energy function and knowing that the system has been displaced by a very small amount from the equilibrium position. (See Class Slides W13D2.)
(2) Explain how you would find the period for a physical pendulum.
